title: Design for "Highlight / Pinch" Flatware
medium: Brush and green and white gouache, black ink and wash, black chalk over graphite on chartreuse paper mounted on board
description: Design for softly contoured stainless steel fork, knife, and spoon with a brushed satin finish on lime green patch of gouache on lighter green paper.  Flatware teardrop-shaped handles are elongated, tapered, and depressed.
name: Drawing
